# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in quality, innovation, and unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, I believe its value extends well beyond $15000. To ensure we both achieve satisfaction, I propose a special introductory offer of $18000 for this extraordinary product. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this masterpiece could elevate your experience. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
